subSections.text:
{{Han char|rn=40|rad=宀|as=12|sn=15|four=|canj=JPAM|ids=⿱[[宀]][[惺]]}}

# (non-classical form) to [[awake]] (from errors, illusions, etc.), to [[come to one's senses]], to start [[think]]ing [[sensibly]]
# (interchangeable with [[惺]]) [[clever]]
# [[wise]]
# [[waver]]ing
# [[indecisive]]
